attributes.action: Make menstrual products free in England
attributes.additional_details: Women in the UK spend as much as £15,738 due to their periods throughout their lives.
attributes.background: We are an NCS team working to combat period poverty. We believe that period products should be free for everyone as periods are not a choice and many struggle with affording menstrual products or do not have access to them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Make sanitary products freely available to all women
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584711
